titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Doris Ballenberg Papers, 1931-1935
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett, May 2008.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Correspondence, clippings, ephemera, and poetry from Ballenberg's time as a student at Vassar College. Includes two poems by "Betty" and "Muriel." "Muriel" may be Muriel Rukeyser, VC 1934, but it may also be Muriel Fox, VC 1935.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Doris Ballenberg Newman was a member of the Vassar College Class of 1935. She served on the student newspaper, the Miscellany News, from 1931-1932.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection contains correspondence, clippings, ephemera, and poetry from Ballenberg's time as a student at Vassar College. Includes two poems by "Betty" and "Muriel." "Muriel" may be Muriel Rukeyser, VC 1934, but it may also be Muriel Fox, VC 1935. All three served on the Miscellany News, but because the poems are undated it is difficult to determine the authorship. "Betty" may be Elizabeth Brown, VC 1935, Muriel Fox's freshman roommate.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

odd.head: Encoding Information
odd.p: Encoded by Laura Streett, May 2008. Updated by Emma Gronbeck, January 2023.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Barbara Newman Morris, May 2008 (M2008-006).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Doris Ballenberg Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

did.unittitle: Poems, from "Muriel and Betty" to Doris Ballenberg,
